TopicTitle: Advanced nose cones - type B explode without warning on reentry

Articles.Content:
Got this situation many times - no thermal bars on overheat, just an explosion.

 

Previously noticed that if a type B cone is installed on a booster as suggested the cone goes yellow significantly faster than a "straight" type A cone. Even on a subsonic speed.

 

Type B seems to be less thermal conductive or far more draggy (or even buggy).

 

I am on 1.05

Edited February 25, 2016 by _Astra_
additional info
